description: Unique identifier for the asset billing record.
Identifier or tag for the asset being billed.
Organization, agency, or customer account associated with the assetâ€™s billing.
Base charge rate applied to the asset per billing period.
Notes or explanation of how the base rate is determined or applied.
Readable description of the billing code applied to this asset.
Coverage amount or insured value used to calculate insurance charges.
Rate used to compute the insurance premium for the asset.
Indicates whether parts issued to this asset are billed.
Indicates whether markup on parts is billed.
Indicates whether labor charges are billed.
Indicates whether outsourced/sublet work costs are billed.
Indicates whether miscellaneous charges are included on the bill.
Indicates whether credits/adjustments are included on the bill (likely reducing charges; confirm with SME).
Indicates whether fuel usage charges are billed.
Indicates whether a markup on fuel is billed.
Indicates whether a recurring monthly base charge is applied.
Indicates whether insurance-related charges are billed.
Indicates whether mileage or usage-based charges are billed.
Indicates whether departmental or overhead charges are billed.
Flag for billing departmental markup or surcharge (likely department-allocated markup; confirm with SME).
Indicates whether an asset replacement charge is billed.
Amount charged when a replacement charge is applied.
Code identifying an additional base charge type applied to the asset.
Description of the additional base charge type.
Rate or amount for the additional base charge.
Indicates whether the asset is billed in January.
Indicates whether the asset is billed in February.
Indicates whether the asset is billed in March.
Indicates whether the asset is billed in April.
Indicates whether the asset is billed in May.
Indicates whether the asset is billed in June.
Indicates whether the asset is billed in July.
Indicates whether the asset is billed in August.
Indicates whether the asset is billed in September.
Indicates whether the asset is billed in October.
Indicates whether the asset is billed in November.
Indicates whether the asset is billed in December.
